jd: Hello ,I am a Technical Recruiter with Yochana IT, a national IT staffing solutions provider with years of experience delivering value to leading companies across the U.S And CanadaI am currently staffing for MSSQL Database Architect, Below you will find the job description, if you are qualified and interested please send me your Updated Word Document Resume.My apologies if this position is not an ideal fit, we'll keep you in mind for other suitable positions and referrals would be appreciated.Thank you in advanceMSSQL Database ArchitectLocation: Cary, NC or Atlanta GAContract JD:MSSQL Database Architect- Advise on design of SQL server databases within OneStream that meet business requirements, ensure data integrity, and optimize performance- Develop database architecture including data modeling and indexing strategies, database and datatable copies, data reloads- Collaborate with Red Hat development team to identify strategic recommendations for improvements- Ensure databases run efficiently and meet scalability requirements- Security: SSO, login, global level app security, data encryption / decryption- Provide overall guidance on best practices and compliance with industry standards- Design and develop automation possibilities, i.e. leveraging task scheduler in OneStreamThanks & RegardsSruthi MangaYochana Solutions IncMail ID: Sruthi@yochana.com |8 [http://www.yochana.com|]www.yochana.com|
